dmca.title: Intellectual Propery Right/Copyright Violation by The Planet.com - From Kaneesha.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

________________________________

From: Hello - Kaneesha.com [mailto:Hello@kaneesha.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2007 5:13 PM
To: Legal; Copyright; Abuse
Subject: Intellectual Propery Right/Copyright Violation by The
Planet.com - From Kaneesha.com

 

Dear Sir/Madam, 

 

We are in the business of ethnic Indian dress designing and selling
dresses through our exclusive outlets in USA, India and several parts of
the world. After designing of the dresses and apparel to be sold by us,
cause photographic images of such products to be created for the
purposes of publicity by way of catalogues and on our website etc. The
dress designs created by us and the photographic images of such products
are the exclusive property of Kaneesha Boutique Inc USA, Kaneesha
Boutique India and Kaneesha.com to be utilized by us alone, unless we
have expressly licensed others to so utilize them. 

 

We own web site Kaneesha.com since 2001 and display the dresses designed
by us on this web site. 

 

We were shocked to find that many of the designs solely and originally
created by us and shown on our website, Kaneesha.com for publicity and
as an online catalogue, have been illegally copied and used by India
Fashion House, Inderjeet Singh, 50  moti bazar dehradun, Dehradun,
Himachal Pradesh,248001, INDIA, on their website
indiafashionboutique.com, thereby misrepresenting people into believing
that the same have been designed by indiafashionboutique.com. and
displayed at www.indiafashionboutique.com
<http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/> ,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product.php?hid=13&id=24&naam=C
huridar%20Suits,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product.php?hid=13&id=25&naam=E
mbriodered%20Suits,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product.php?hid=13&id=26&naam=E
ast%20West%20Suits,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/subcat.php?hid=12&naam=Sarees%20/%20
Cholis%20Skirts,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product_full.php?id=23&hid=12&n
aam=Lengha%20-%20Cholis,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/subcat.php?hid=14&naam=Jewellery,
http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/subcat.php?hid=15&naam=Accessories.
We were further shocked to find that indiafashionboutique.com have used
the designs originally created by us. They have also caused the images
to be displayed through indiafashionboutique.com, thereby passing off
and/or attempting to pass off the said designs as if they had been
created by indiafashionboutique.com. Please note that this misleading
action has caused great loss and harm to our name and reputation in the
international market, as most of the designs created by us and displayed
on our web site have been reproduced by indiafashionboutique.com. Do
further note that this action is a gross violation of intellectual
property laws by indiafashionboutique.com and/or their
associates/partners as indiafashionboutique.com and those concerned with
them have attempted to pass off designs created by us as original
creations of indiafashionboutique.com. Our products sought to be shown
to be as those of indiafashionboutique.com and also as appearing through
your web server are as displayed at URLs specified above (we have saved
copies of all the pages and can be produced to appropriate legal
authority as required). 

 

This action constitutes an infringement of our exclusive right on the
dresses and our design as well as photographs/images created by us for
the purpose of our exclusive use for advertising of the products. The ip
address 70.84.175.130 where the site is hosted resolves to your server
Theplanet.com. Not only have indiafashionboutique.com infringed the
exclusive right in respect of the above but you have also tried to pass
of products designed by us as those of their own by allowing them to
host illegally downloaded images on your web server. This act in posting
images of products designed by us is a violation of our trade designs
originally created and designed by a designing team of Kaneesha.com,
which is unique to our images. This action is also a violation of the
Intellectual Property Right/ Copyright act of Untied States of America
and Indian Information Technology Act, 2000. 

 

 

We therefore hereby call upon you to remove/cause to be removed, the
above images hosted on your web server within a period of 48 hours of
receipt of this notice and inform us of such compliance, failing which
you , along with indiafashionboutique.com shall be liable to face legal
action and costs of the same shall be at your responsibility. 

 

Nimesh Dave 

President 

Kaneesha Boutique Inc. 

13 Remington Dr Edison NJ 08820 USA 

 

Kaneesha Boutique 

1 Animesh Bldg. C G Road, Ahmedabad Gujarat India 

May 22 2007 

 

Following is the registration information of responssible parties
against whom we will initiate legal action if our notice is not complied
with within 48 hours.
